summary: Adds the playable Garbon race, and Zora the narcotic merchant.
descriptionHtml:
Hailing from the Caves of Garbondar of northern Morrowind, the Garbon evolved themselves and their culture to live in darkness. Despite their efforts to remain hidden, the Dunmer ultimately found their homeland and slaughtered most of their people. They have also been known to consume narcotics to connect with the Nine Divines.

------ 
Stats 
------ 

Sneak: 10 
One-Handed: 10 
Archery: 10 
Pickpocket: 5 

Starting Health: 40 (-10) 
Starting Magic: 50 
Starting Stamina 60 (+10) 

Base Carry Weight: 150 (-150) 

Male Height: 0.6 
Female Height: 0.575 

------ 
Once-A-Day Powers 
------ 

Green Out: Harness the power of Chronic and feed it to your foes. (Paralyze target for 60 seconds.)

------ 
Lesser Powers 
------ 

Cave Sight: Improved night vision for 30 seconds. 

Vanish: Vanish from sight. (Invisibility and an increase in Sneak by 100, for 30 seconds.) 

------ 
Abilities 
------ 

Poison Resistance: Your Garbon blood gives you 50% resistance poisons. 

Nimble Feet: Your nimble feet make for quick getaways. 

------ 
Bugs 
------ 

1. The camera resets to average person height when you load a save, but this can be fixed. 
To change the camera angle back to Garbon height, open the console with the ~ key, and type "showracemenu" before pressing enter, accepting the race, and renaming your character. 

2. There is an issue where Garbon cannot function as a Vampire in the Dawnguard storyline, and cannot drink blood. I would reccomend not being a Vampire as a Garbon completely.
author: celticberserker
